To anyone who doesn't know about Dark Souls 3, don't worry. The eyes are an item you can find in the game and give to her but she says she's not supposed to have them and asks you to kill her. After you do that, she'll just respawn and not just because of gameplay purposes but because of story purposes. TLDR, the Fire Keeper can't die.

Hmm... Mmmmmm... Hmm... Mmm... Oh! Pardon me, I was absorbed in thought. I am Siegward of Catarina. To be honest, I'm in a bit of a pickle.Have you ever walked near a white birch, only to be struck by a great arrow? Well, if I'm not mistaken, they come from this tower. Whoever it is, I'm sure I can talk some sense into them.But I have to find a way up, and that's just the trouble. This lift only goes down, you see, and... Well, that doesn't get me anywhere... Hmm... Mmm

@EvolutionKills, AMEN NIGGA! we need more gamers like you who will end the cycle. I thought all the gamers burned themselves in the first flame for NO GODDAMN REASON! Firekeeper is a Goddess and we must preserve her. Everyone who has read this has automatically devoted their lives to this cause. I along with the 120+ comments will form an army to purge the infidels and the thots who don't submit to our order. If Dark souls 4 comes out, there will be a covenant called "Firekeeper Faithful".

Thou hesitates, because FUCK THAT SHIT! We're ending the cycle! Let the Age of Fire finally run it's course, instead of propping up it's corpse with the sacrifice of innocents for the umpteenth time! Then we're ridding off into the darkness, together!

That's my head cannon, and I'm sticking with it! Also, Sister Friede can eat a bag of dicks.

When cannon gets better.

@Slick47, clearly you haven't been that far in the manga. Let me spoil you. So In the final page, Ashen One hesitates on granting Firekeeper's wish to kill her. This can be a foreshadowing on one of the 4 endings after defeating Soul of Cinder. Extinguishing the First Flame leads to a future of darkness, uncertainty and freedom with Firekeeper. Attacking Firekeeper during the cutscene (Don't you dare fucking do it, even a platinum trophy isn't worth it) allows you to take the First Flame for yourself, diabolically murdering Firekeeper. Now, if this manga is indeed CANNON, that means, Firekeeper will not be killed because Ashen One isn't selfish and preserves the life of his precious lover. Which means that an Age of Darkness is indeed cannon if this is cannon. Your wish is granted, so as mine: Firekeeper and Ashen One are free.

Question: the ashen one was hesitating on killing her, does that mean the ashen one does not wanna kill her?

Bc during one of the endings that is the fire keeper end with a bit of the secret ending, she was stepped by ashen one. So im just imagine a scenario that when she lays down, the ashen one holds the flame with her and sharing it. If this happens, i want the ashen one and fire keeper to be together and have a deep plot as the fire keeper is afraid of seeing the world while the ashen one helps her.
